Easilly, one of the best stories of all time in gaming.

not a fan of the 2 weapon limit, i honestly think it was stupid and irrational
other than that the combat is fun and the story is pretty fahkin good (can be a bit melodramatic at times tho.)
Good game, doing this for a sticker pack

Tirando isso,Ã© um excelente jogo,porÃ©m,nÃ£o vale os noventa conto cobrado,pegue apenas se tiver em promocao ,com esse dinheiro vc compra mt jogo igualmente foda que pode atÃ© te dar mais horas de jogo.

Os grÃ¡ficos sÃ£o meio cartunescos,porem,nÃ£o possuem cell shading,e tbm nao sao mt simples,mas sÃ£o muito bonitos.
A jogabilidade Ã© boa,porÃ©m pra mim os poderes tinham q ficar no scroll e a mira no botÃ£o direito,pq vc vai acabar mirando mais doq usando poderes
A dublagem Ã© muito boa,os atores bem escolhido,Troy Baker faazendo o bom trabalho de sempre.
Como dito anteriormente,a histÃ³ria Ã© de arrepiar o C* da b*unda,magnifica ,com plot twist magnifico
Basicamente,antes de jogar esse jogo eu considerava The Last of Us o melhor jogo q ja joguei,em seguida GTA V em segundo e Metal Gear phantom pain em terceiro,mais agora TLOU e BioUVA(apelido carinhoso que sÃ³ os fortes vao entender) estÃ£o empatados.
Basicamente Este jogo Ã© magnifico,mas por ser uma experiencia que nao vai segurar vc por muito tempo nao vale o preÃ§o,pra mim o maximo que poderia ser cobrado Ã© quarenta reais.
Fantastic Game
Maybe the best game I've ever played. The story is one you can't stop thinking about.
Got the game on sale, finished it in one day, so I'd say it was a pretty good story. But I'm sure it's not healthy to binge play a game like I did.

you must try this game.

I didn't like this game.

It looks pretty, but is somehow shallow under the pretty surface. Definitely outstayed its welcome to me. The gunplay was just boring, and since its most of what you do in this game, I got my "enjoyment" out of it rather quickly.

I've seen the story yes. It doesn't strike me as anything spectacular. I don't get what the hype was about, and that's my problem.

Look, jesus, i spent five hours thinking about what to say about this game but words don't do it any justice. BUY THE GAME.
It's a game that will make you want to ask the developers all the questions you have just to find the truth about a game, but this is no ordinary game.
Solo puedo decir que el juego es grandioso, la banda sonora es genial y su historia es asombrosa
Played through a second time on the computer this time, loved it even more than the time on xbox 360.
really good
Amazing
one of the best games i've ever played, the ending will fuck you up
If you are looking for an amazing story game then get this.

Great story game with a mind bending ending. I loved the drinks that gave you superpowers and the city of Columbia. The game feels like a steampunk Disney movie and I like it. Would recommend on sale
Obra maestra

Ya know, I started the game with the expectation of Bioshock in the sky, and while the first hour didn't hold much value for me, the game is amazing in its own way. While it's missing the complex system of the first game, it has a much more emotional story, one that wrapped me up and made me stick through the first little while. And the game sprawls then, and creates characters and relationships that are interesting and sincere. I feel like I've just eaten an entire pie of mindbending apples.

Superb story. An interesting and unique world satricially depicting a fanatic Christian city. Graphics are still pretty good today. The characters aren't as strong as a game like The Last of Us but still well developed and interesting. Combat is pretty good but nothing speical and a bit repetitive. Overall a fantastic game driven by its world, story and characters, 9/10

FabuÅ‚a jest jednoczeÅ›nie absurdalna, intrygujÄ…ca, zaskakujÄ…ca, przewidywalna (ale w pozytywnym sensie!) i w pewnym stopniu wiarygodna. Do Infinite chce siÄ™ wracaÄ‡, podobnie jak do pierwszego Bioshocka. Poziomy sÄ… rozlegÅ‚e, opcji taktycznych i kombinacji mocy jest bardzo wiele, gameplay praktycznie nigdy siÄ™ nie nudzi. game suck lol

Elizabeth

Combat mechanic is somewhat generic, but hell, the style of this game and story is the one and only, ive completed this game on my console few years ago, and im going to do that again on my PC, really worth every penny even if it's not for sale

One of the GREATEST story games of this generation, right up there with Fallout 4 and GTA V. Never played a bioshock game before, but regardless this game told quite possibly the best story of any game, ever! 10/10 all day, I cant belive that I only just now played this game in 2017, despite it's release being back in 2013. I would recommend this game to anyone that wants a fantastic, FPS story  game.

La verdad tenia grandes expectativas con este juego, y debo decir que las cumpliÃ³ todas, es un excelente tÃ­tulo, bien optimizado, grÃ¡ficos excelentes, su jugabilidad 10/10 y en especial su historia es excelente, una obra maestra que vale la pena totalmente jugarla, incluso al final te deja con ganas de mÃ¡s, juegazo 10/10

Good plot twist and extraordinary graphics
Best game I've ever played. Fantastic story. Fun gameplay. Aesthetic setting. 11/10

Best fps I've ever played, in my own opinion. Not only is the gameplay super fun and different, but the storyline is amazing too. Loved how customizeable gameplay is, being able to upgrade weapons and vigors and different armor. Hard to say whether I liked bioshock one or infinite better, but infinite was less confusing and easier. Soundtrack is also great, heck this is just one cool game. Only problem I have with this game was the battle with [spoiler] Lady Comstock because it's hard as fuck in hard difficulty and took me like 3000 tries [/spoiler] but other than that, yeah reccomended even now when it's a super old game
Magnifique
By far one of my favorite games. The story is engrossing, the music is beautiful, the characters are interesting and the gameplay is fun.
historia marcante

Recomendadisimo, graficamente es hermoso, las fisicas de los enemigos estan super bien hechas, la historia es super interesante y te engancha con un final perfecto, lo mejor de todo.. Elizabeth.

From the Five Games I got this Steam Summer Sale, this is definetly the best. Very nice Game Mechanic

Pros
- Good graphics 
- Well optimized (90 FPS on Ultra)
- Amazing story
- Extremly unique and fun combat
- No bugs/glitches (throughout my entire time playing)
Cons
- I honestly cant think of any besides I would have liked the story to be a bit longer.
Overall I cannot recommend this game enough It truly is a masterpeice 10/10.

This game is amazing!

This way and still is one of my favorite games. The story is great, and while the everyone is really confusing, I liked it a lot, which is more than I can say for many of the games I have played. The actual combat of the game is pretty standard fps, with special super powers, but not terribly difficult. So it should probably be played more for the storyline than any challenging combat.
A wonderful, wonderful game.
